title: Kevin & Perry Go Large - OST (2 Cd's)
description:
This is the original soundtrack to the movie, Kevin and Perry Go Large. Great soundtrack to a great movie and I hope you enjoy. The CD&#039;s are separated into their own file so that it&#039;s not all messy. :)

Track list:

CD 1:

1. Big Girl-Precocious Brats
2. Kid 2000-Hybrid
3. I&#039;m In The Mood For Love-Jools Holland And His Rhythm & Blue
4. Ooh La La-Wiseguys
